text: Career Opportunities is a 1991 American romantic comedy movie starring Frank Whaley, Jennifer Connelly, Dermot Mulroney, Kieran Mulroney and John Candy. It was directed by Bryan Gordon and is based on the John Hughes script. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. == Other websites == * * * Career Opportunities at The Numbers * Career Opportunities All Job Category:1991 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies set in department stores Category:Movies set in shopping malls Category:Movies set in Illinois Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Career Opportunities (movie)
